text: Taba hamile unitira ‘‘vahya’’ pathayaum ki hamro amkhako agadi ra hamro ‘‘vahya’’ anusara e'uta dunga bana'u, ani jaba hamro adesa a'umcha ra jaba paniko badhi a'umcha taba pratyeka prajatiharumadhyebata eka–eka jodi tyasama rakhihala, ra aphantaharula'i pani, tara uni baheka jasako virud'dha hamile nirnaya di'isakeka chaum ra atyacariharuko visayama masita kura nagarnu. Tiniharu ta duba'ine nai chan
